description: This dataset is derived as annual aggregates from 2022 US EPA Daily Summary PM 2.5 FRM/FEM Mass (88101).
license:

name: 2022 US EPA Annual Estimates PM 2.5 FRM/FEM Mass (88101)

variableMeasured.description: The percent representing the number of observations taken with respect to the number scheduled to be taken during the day. This is only calculated for monitors where measurements are required (e.g., only certain parameters).
variableMeasured.name: observation_percent

variableMeasured.description: The FIPS code of the county in which the monitor resides.
variableMeasured.name: county_code

variableMeasured.description: The average (arithmetic mean) value for all days observed in the year.
variableMeasured.name: arithmetic_mean

variableMeasured.description: The FIPS code of the state in which the monitor resides.
variableMeasured.name: state_code

variableMeasured.description: The highest value for the year.
variableMeasured.name: 1st_max_value

variableMeasured.description: A unique number within the county identifying the site.
variableMeasured.name: site_num
